entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023
